text: (Yasto kina) ki jaba timila'i e'uta kasta di'iyo, jabaki yasako du'iâ€“guna kasta timro hatabata tiniharumathi parisakeko thiyo, ta timiharu bhannathalyau ki yasto sankata kahambata a'iparyo?. Tapa'i bhanidinus ki yo timiharukai tarphabata a'ipugeko ho. Nihsandeha allaha sampurna kuraharumathi sarmathya rakhdacha
